name: Double Down (naperez1)
description:
It's been a while since Jack, the leader of the Super League, saw his old friend Dale.  He sets out to visit Dale, just one day before an alien invasion is set to land, to play a friendly game of Russian roulette. The stakes? Whether or not Dale will help the League take on the invasion.

  • Both serious and funny moments
  • Old-school Matriax8c art
  • Thrilling animations
  • Short and Sweet: About 10 minutes

Made this for the 2021 Global Game Jam.
